review: So far, very enjoyable. No commercials.
author: L. D. Vickers

review: Fire TV Stick is great . It's my Comcast router that is the problem. Had to buy a WiFi Extender to connect and I get frequent messages that my download speed is too slow so I am contacting comcast about it. Wish me luck.
author: A Dell "arty d"

review: Love it! Love how it comes personally programmed
author: Katie Tortorich

review: Having s great time using Fire stick. It's simple and easy to use.
author: Polkadot40

review: Mostly I like the space saving for our kitchen TV. No more Blue Ray player to watch Netflix.  We can also take our Netflix traveling with us on vacation.
author: Maria DeVore

review: This streaming stick worked great, at first, but is now useless. It either won't connect at all, or will allow a show to begin streaming and then buffer until it loses signal. And the problem is not our WiFi because I can stream anything on my smart phone or kindle in the same room the fire stick is in. Such a disappointment.
author: Beth

review: We are still learning how to master it. But overall it pretty cool device. We see not that savvy with electronics.
author: brenda phillips

review: Works awesome! Loads movies fast. This works better than my smart tv. Great bargain at $34. Purchased for my parents so they could watch Netflix & Amazon Prime. They are enjoying it.
author: Betsy
